001package imagingbook.pub.corners.subpixel;
002
003public class TestSubclassList {
004
005        public static void main(String[] args) {
006                Class<?> clazz = MaxLocator.class;
007                Class<?>[] subclazzes = clazz.getDeclaredClasses();
008                
009                for (Class<?> c : subclazzes) {
010                        System.out.format("%s: local=%b member=%b interface=%b enum=%b enclosedBy=%s\n", c.getName(), c.isLocalClass(), c.isMemberClass(), c.isInterface(), c.isEnum(), c.getEnclosingClass().getSimpleName());
011                }
012        }
013}
